OCTAFX SERVICE
10 years of steady growth worldwide
43 industry awards from experts and popular vote

TRADING CONDITIONS

50% deposit bonus for all deposits
1 U.S. dollar = 3 ringgits | Fixed deposit rate option
No swaps or any hidden commissions

IN-APP FEATURES
Instant deposits to your trading accounts and Wallet
Fast withdrawals taking from a few seconds to a maximum of three hours
Instant transfers between trading accounts

HELPFUL CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We are ready to help every day around the clock
We speak English, Malaysian, Chinese, and 4 more languages
